attributes.action: Reduce the stress of A levels and its destructive effects on teenage mental health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many teenagers study hard for their A-levels. However there are signs of increasing depression and ill mental health amongst teenagers who do A levels. We urge the Prime minister to reform the A level system in a way that will keep the high standards of A levels in place whilst reducing its destructive effects on teenage mental health.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
